page.title: 02MATERNITY UNIT TO CLOSE.
page.content: The Maternity unit at Orsett Hospital is to close by the end of 1985,and there is growing concern that the much used Casualty deartment will close very soon.It has been rumoured that the emergency unit at Orsett will be moved to Basildon Hospital about 8 miles away.Apparently they have three options-firstly to close both Basildon and Orsett Hospitals emergency units-secondly keeping one open full time and the other part time,and thirdly leaving them both open full time and saving costs in other areas.The Casualty department in Orsett is used by 42,000 people a year and Basildon by 50,000.The Regional Health Authority will make the final decision
